context: Municipal utility company planning transition from coal-based to renewable energy sources to meet regulatory requirements and reduce carbon emissions

request.purpose: Construction of solar and wind farms to replace 40% of coal generation capacity
request.justification: Compliance with new emissions regulations and achievement of carbon neutrality by 2035

decision_process.outcome: Funding secured through green bonds and government grants

business_impact.expected_outcome: 40% reduction in carbon emissions, compliance with regulations, improved public image

lessons_learned: Early community engagement essential for renewable projects, regulatory timelines often exceed expectations
